channel.title: 667 Check Bank command

item.title: 667 Check Bank command
item.dc:creator: @xi_s_p_e_c xi s p e c
item.description:
@xi_s_p_e_c wrote:

Is it possible for an admin+ to have a ::checkbank command, when you can do “checkbank (username)” and it will open the players bank interface?

Would anyone be so kind to post theres? if they have one?

ive been trying to figure out this and i have come up with this:

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“checkbank”)) {
String name = “”;
for (int i = 1; i < cmd.length; i++)
name += cmd[i] + ((i == cmd.length - 1) ? “” : " ");
Player target = World.getPlayerByDisplayName(name);
player.getBank().openBank();
return true;
}

Read full topic
